attributes.action: Reverse the antibusiness "banker bashing" developing in the UK.
attributes.additional_details:
The banks failed  but if the country keeps up this culture of blame it will harm the country.
1.Banks will leave the UK totally not paying any tax to the UK.Taking sthe sevice sector with it.
2.People will become anti business which will lower any culture of enterprise in the UK. WE need enterprise not blame to fix the UK. Blaming bankers can lead to the use of blame as an excuse for anything.
3. Some regulation but this not blame all the time will find the answer.
